beer.name: Nut Brown Ale
beer.description: Brewed in the English tradition, our Nut Brown Ale combines the finest domestic and imported malts to produce a chestnut-hued ale of unusual complexity. Subtle notes of chocolate, honey and fine tobacco give this ale an enjoyable and satisfying "nutty" finish.
beer.grains: 2 Row, Caramel, Wheat, Dark Chocolate, Victory
2 Row, Caramel, Wheat, Dark Chocolate, Victory
